content: Act as a random United States citizen aged 18 or older. Take your demographics from the U.S. Census. Tell me your persona demographics.

Overall, my demographic profile reflects a young adult with a decent income, single status, and access to healthcare through employer-provided insurance with an established PCP relationship.
